Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Houston in 1992...
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1993 (Going to HOU: 1B E. Martinez, P M. Perez, SS B. Larkin. Going to PIT: SS J. Valentin, 3B N. Nakamura, 1B A. Cabrera)...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1994, off Bill Long (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1994, off Paul Abbott (CIN)...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 4/6/1995...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1995...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1996, hitting .389 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Houston on 8/10/1996...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1996, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
